post.body: yes please. If the French are giving up 35hr/wk, maybe we can have them. Get 'em cheap, secondhand.
thanks for the taffy. Tastes just like Utah!
Think you should be the arbitrator in this case: http://xrl.us/2v48u
we got just to 32° and got sleet to weigh down the pack and crust everything. 2-3" since 4PM. Now back to 20°.
Burlington School System: 2hr delay (teachers just got the robo call) #snow1219 #snowmageddon #snow1221
I'd assume you'd be opting-in to spam for that free software privilege. :-) (re: giving tree)
there are always DM "hellos" :-)
I read that as "I just ate the better part of a Canadian."
seeing your parents see their grandchildren is one of the best parts. Are these their first grandchildren? If so, double whammy
who'd want to join twitter and share their inner thoughts with the world? I think weather spotters aren't far from you, actually.
firewire Target Disk Mode if white/black MacBook, if Aluminum, Ethernet and Migration assistant.
if you go to Forrester's corporate blog, they wrote about the report. Thus, I don't trust it.
off on a 13° (feels like 1°) dog walk. Then re-salting the drive.
Had to put in an extra hour shovel/scrape/salting since we got another 3" of wet snow w/ sleet since 4p. If you're waiting, clean car now!
Spent a couple hours cleaning the cars before the sleet came at 3p. Snow is getting very heavy. If you haven't started… #snow1219 #snow1221
The snow hasn't stopped falling since 3pm Friday. All winter should be like this. But if it turns to rain, I'll be pissed.
Dec. just keeps getting better… lost my wedding ring sometime this morning. Involved snow removal and glove removal. Hope it's in the house.
Medford Snow 2008-Dec-19 - http://snaptweet.com/7fad2
Wipers up, people! (lift your wipers off the windshield so they're not frozen down later) #snow1219
Semi-official tag for Boston snow twittering today: #snow1219, you can follow along here: http://xrl.us/p6uri
